installInstructionSection: Bulk load methods on SQL Server are by default serial, which means for example, one BULK INSERT statement would spawn only one thread to insert the data into a table. However, for concurrent loads you may insert into the same table using multiple BULK INSERT statements, provided there are multiple files to be read.
